mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report (report_id, stall_id, content, user_report_reason) VALUES (#{reportId}, #{stallId}, #{content}, #{userReportReason})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM report rp INNER JOIN stall s ON s.stall_id = rp.stall_id INNER JOIN restroom res ON res.restroom_id = s.restroom_id INNER JOIN building b ON b.building_id = res.building_id INNER JOIN master m ON m.master_id = b.building_id WHERE m.master_id = #{masterId}
mapper.update: UPDATE report SET checked = 1 WHERE report_id = #{reportId}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.master_id AS masterId FROM master m INNER JOIN building b ON m.master_id = b.master_id INNER JOIN restroom res ON res.building_id = b.building_id INNER JOIN stall s ON s.restroom_id = res.restroom_id INNER JOIN report rep ON rep.stall_id = s.stall_id WHERE rep.stall_id = #{stallId}
